nodes.text: Dragite gems were small, dull, and brittle kyber crystals found in the D'olop mountain range on the Expansion Region agriworld M'haeli. They were one of the most brittle kyber crystals in existence, and were hard to work into a lightsaber. However, when they were in a lightsaber, they emitted a loud hum, and also produced a shockwave when striking a solid target. These shockwaves had the capability to disorient or harm their target. Dragite gems were sold for 14,000 credits.
